stepTitle: Allen encountered a headwind averaging $$2.00$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$ almost precisely in the opposite direction of his motion relative to the Earth and flew at an average velocity of $$3.53$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$ in a direction 45° south of east. What was his average velocity $$\frac{m}{s}$$ relative to the air?
